Web Search API - Changelog

This changelog outlines all significant changes to the Brave Web Search API in chronological order.

2023-01-01
Add Brave Web Search API resource.
2023-04-14
Change SearchResult restaurant property to location.
2023-10-11
Add spellcheck flag.
Local Search API - Changelog

This changelog outlines all significant changes to the Brave Local Search API in chronological order.

2024-06-11
Add Brave Local Search API resource.
